title: The Ranked system
body: I had a though while on league about ranked. I wanted to know the boarders like when a Gold solo/duo player at the end of the season gets a gold boarder but if he is Diamond in 5v5 will he get a Diamond boarder or a Gold boarder?? That's all thank you :) GGWP

replies.body: Whatever is highest, I believe. I've played with someone with a Challenger border, but they only got Diamond last season in SoloQ. However, they were Challenger in FlexQ, both last season (hence the border) and this season.
